articles.description: The 4G smartphone is not going to receive any more software updates. Google did not push a September software update to the Pixel 4a (the non-5G version),...

articles.author: Tapiwa Matthew Mutisi
articles.title: Google is building an AI-powered microscope to help doctors spot cancer - Innovation Village
articles.description: Google has teamed up with the Department of Defense to develop an ARM to aid doctors in identifying different types of cancer
articles.content: Google has teamed up with the Department of Defense (DoD) to develop an “Augmented Reality Microscope,” (ARM), which incorporates artificial intelligence (AI) enhancements to aid doctors in identifyi… [+1815 chars]
